45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Uqbah bin 'Amir:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The one who recites the Qur'an aloud is like the one who gives charity publicly, and the one who recites the Qur'an quietly is like the one who gives charity secretly

chapter.eng-name: 'Whoever Recites the Qur'an, Then Let Him Ask Allah By It'
